description: Are you a skier looking for innovation and style? Then the Photics Ski Thermo is for you. The world’s first fully waterproof down ski jacket for skiing made with Mammut Laser Fuse Technology™. Whether you’re ripping groomers or charging through powder in cold and snowy weather, this jacket keeps you warm and dry all day long. To top it all off, the one-of-a-kind Photics has loads of practical features: removable snow skirt, hand gaiters, pockets for your ski pass and goggles, cleaning cloth for goggles and ventilation zippers. Mammut Laser Fuse Technology™ gives the Photics its distinctive look. Just the right quantity of down in each area. The jacket has insulation in all the right spots, which also gives the jacket its signature look. Wear the Photics Ski HS Thermo with our Trift Pro Thermo Pants for a ski outfit that combines innovation, performance and design.
name: Mammut Photics Ski HS Thermo Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Laser welded seams without stitching to avoid down leakage; narrow seams reduce cold spots for better heat retention
